and ui.name Like CONCAT('%', #{companysearch}, '%')
and ui.user_type = "B"
order by tfj.reg_date desc
order by ui.name
order by tf.fair_title
order by tfj.reg_date desc
limit #{pageindex}, #{pageSize}
